releaseNotes.title: March 2025 Release
releaseNotes.summary: Here's what's new in this release:

features.title: Higher Machine Count
features.descriptions: We now support a higher machine count for internal users.

features.title: Table Row Expansion & State Retention
features.descriptions:
1. Users can now expand the number of items per page from 8 to 64.
  2. The selected items-per-page setting is retained when navigating to another page and returning.

features.title: Fixes Provided
features.descriptions:
1. Resolved an issue where user groups in the Admin tab displayed negative user counts.
  2. In the admin page, 'Select All' checkbox for Machine Attributes, User Attributes, and Features now functions correctly and no longer remains disabled intermittently.
  3. Fixed an issue where assigning a large group, such as all telemetry machines, caused a bad request on the Overview Page.
  4. Fixed an issue where selecting a 6-month time filter in the Overview, Runtime, and Battery pages resulted in a bad request.
  5. Fixed an issue where the runtime graph was not updating correctly after applying the machine filter.
  6. Fixed a discrepancy where the decimal hours were off between the Propel Time values in the Daily Usage Page and its Email Report.
  7. The charge time for individual dates on the Usage Page now displays data with two decimal places.
  8. Fixed an issue where the email containing the Usage and Runtime PDF reports failed to send to customers in the production environment.
  9. Fixed an issue where the filter window remained visible after navigating back across different pages.
  10. Fixed an issue in the Location page where, in landscape mode on mobile devices, the map displayed in a way that made scrolling difficult, preventing access to the location table.

releaseNotes.title: December 2024 Release
releaseNotes.summary: Here's what's new in this release:

features.title: Maintenance Reminders now available for Lite Devices
features.descriptions: Now any connected machine, including those with Lite Telemetry, can send maintenance reminders when a threshold for cleaning hours is met. Users can also export a CSV report of maintenance reminders.

features.title: Release Notes viewable in the Iris portal
features.descriptions: When there is an update to the portal, a notification will show in the menu. Click the question mark icon to navigate to the What's New tab to view details of the release.

features.title: Alert Notification Enhancement
features.descriptions: Unread or new alert notifications are now indicated by a red dot for improved visibility.

features.title: Fixes Provided
features.descriptions:
1. We fixed an issue where some sub-groups saw a blank Battery page without data. Those users can now see their data in the Battery page.
  2. We fixed an issue where the Cleaning Hour meter was not updating for some machines.
